title: Unbinding F12?
body:
I play with relatively uncommon key binds because I'm a lefty (QWER=P[]\ , DF=KL, 123456 = 890-=backspace) and I've recently decided to rebind my camera controls to F9, F10, F11, and F12. The only problem is, F12 is the default screenshot key, a feature I have no interest in.

Is there anything I can change (In the input file perhaps) that will effectively unbind it? I've tried adding evtMakeScreenShot = [], both under [GameEvents] and [HUDEvents] with no success. Is there any fix for this? It's really inconvenient.

replies.body:
Because F12 is hardbound (much like the ESC key), it's going to be fairly difficult (if even possible) to make it work.

I strongly recommend against modifying the key in your input file, as it could break things, but if you end up in trouble and need to reset your inputs, let me know and I'll be happy to help.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=I4E38441,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-16T22:01:12.387+0000)
>
> Because F12 is hardbound (much like the ESC key), it's going to be fairly difficult (if even possible) to make it work.
> 
> I strongly recommend against modifying the key in your input file, as it could break things, but if you end up in trouble and need to reset your inputs, let me know and I'll be happy to help.

That's pretty frustrating. Thanks anyway, I guess.

i've binded my "esc" to F12.

So now I press F12 to bring my menu up.

But I just went to check my screen shot folder, and I do have a few screens of me adjusting my menu.

Do you know any keyboard moderator software,I mean,you can change f12 to f4 or whatever,then the game won't do the screen cap.
But this kind software maybe seen as cheat.
